SignInPage.title: Sign in
SignInPage.description-tooltip: This makes it easier for you to sign in, limits the amount of personal data we store, and reduces the risk of security breaches.
SignInPage.disclaimer: By signing in, you agree to our <terms>Terms of Service</terms> and <privacy>Privacy Policy</privacy>.

error.title: Sign-in error
error.description: An error occurred while signing in. Please try again.
